org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports

Class AbstractReportsSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.AbstractReportsSchema
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NiReportsSchema
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmpReportsSchema, DRCReportsTestSchema, HardcodedReportsTestSchema, TanzaniaReportsTestSchema

    public abstract class AbstractReportsSchema
extends java.lang.Object
implements NiReportsSchema
    an abstract NiReportsSchema which contains utility methods for defining a schema in a coder-friendly way while ensuring reasonable safeguards for correctness.

      • addDerivedLinearFilterMeasure

        public AbstractReportsSchema addDerivedLinearFilterMeasure(java.lang.String compMeasureName,
                                                           java.lang.String description,
                                                           Behaviour<?> behaviour,
                                                           java.lang.Object... def)
        constructs a NiCombinationContextTransactionMeasure measure and then adds it to the schema by using addMeasure(NiReportMeasure)
        Parameters:
        compMeasureName - the name of the measure to construct
        description - the description of the measure to construct
        behaviour - the behaviour of the measure to construct
        def - an even-length array. Each pair is a (measureName, Number) tuple. The measureName should reference an already-defined measure of type NiTransactionContextMeasure.
        Returns:
        See Also:
        for information on the measure built and inserted by this function

      • addLinearFilterMeasure

        public AbstractReportsSchema addLinearFilterMeasure(java.lang.String compMeasureName,
                                                    java.lang.String description,
                                                    Behaviour<?> behaviour,
                                                    boolean ignoreFilters,
                                                    boolean stripCoords,
                                                    java.lang.Object... def)
        constructs a NiLinearCombinationTransactionMeasure measure and then adds it to the schema by using addMeasure(NiReportMeasure)
        Parameters:
        compMeasureName - the name of the measure to construct
        description - the description of the measure to construct
        behaviour - the behaviour of the measure to construct
        ignoreFilters - whether the constructed measure should be based off filtered or unfiltered funding cells. See NiPredicateTransactionMeasure.ignoreFilters
        stripCoords - whether to strip coordinates off the generated cells
        def - def an even-length array. Each pair is a (measureName, Number) tuple. The measureName should reference an already-defined measure of type NiTransactionMeasure.
        Returns:

      • addFormulaComputedMeasure

        public AbstractReportsSchema addFormulaComputedMeasure(java.lang.String compMeasureName,
                                                       java.lang.String description,
                                                       NiFormula formula,
                                                       boolean average)

        Use this method to add computed measures for which scaling does not apply.

        See also addFormulaComputedMeasure(String, String, NiFormula, boolean, boolean).

      • addFormulaComputedMeasure

        public AbstractReportsSchema addFormulaComputedMeasure(java.lang.String compMeasureName,
                                                       java.lang.String description,
                                                       NiFormula formula,
                                                       boolean average,
                                                       TimeRange timeRange)

      • addFormulaComputedMeasure

        public AbstractReportsSchema addFormulaComputedMeasure(java.lang.String compMeasureName,
                                                       java.lang.String description,
                                                       NiFormula formula,
                                                       boolean average,
                                                       boolean isScalableByUnits,
                                                       TimeRange timeRange)
        constructs a measure based off a formula and then adds it to the schema by using addMeasure(NiReportMeasure). The measure would be of one of NiFormulaicMeasure or NiFormulaicAverageMeasure
        Parameters:
        compMeasureName - the name of the measure to construct
        description - the description of the measure to construct
        formula - the formula to drive the cells
        average - whether to create a NiFormulaicAverageMeasure (e.g. populate trail cells based off the average of a formula across cells) or a NiFormulaicMeasure (e.g. populate body and trail cells based off the value of the formula)
        isScalableByUnits - are cells created by this measure to be scaled or not
        Returns:

      • addFormulaComputedMeasure

        public AbstractReportsSchema addFormulaComputedMeasure(java.lang.String compMeasureName,
                                                       java.lang.String description,
                                                       NiFormula formula,
                                                       boolean average,
                                                       boolean isScalableByUnits)

      • parseContextFilterMap

        public java.util.Map<NiTransactionContextMeasure,java.math.BigDecimal> parseContextFilterMap(java.lang.String errPrefix,
                                                                                             java.lang.Object... def)
        parses an even-length array of (NiTransactionContextMeasure, Number) elements into a Map from measure to BigDecimal. Normally used for building linear-combination measures
        Parameters:
        errPrefix - the prefix of the error message in the exception to the generated in case of any error
        def - the even-length array
        Returns:

      • byMeasureDividingBehaviour

        public TrivialMeasureBehaviour byMeasureDividingBehaviour(TimeRange tr,
                                                          java.lang.String measureName)
        builds a numerical column behaviour which is trivial in all regards except that it divides its output by the per-report total of a measure
        Parameters:
        tr - the time range of the generated behaviour
        measureName - the measure by whose total the results should be divided. It is up to the schema to ensure that this measure has been previously fetched
        Returns:
